Looking Back

31 Dec 2017

As I look ahead to blogging in 2018, I’m also looking back at my prior attempts.

Sad to see that one of my old blogs —my first one— seems to be no more.

I blogged (a little) at JRoller between 2006 and 2007.

This is a perfect example of why I'm doing things with Micro.blog today.
